mutants.code:
import bisect

def min_removals(arr, n):
    ans = float('inf')
    arr.sort()
    if 2 * arr[0] > arr[n - 1]:
        return 0
    for i in range(n):
        temp = 2 * arr[i]
        p = bisect.bisect_right(arr, temp)
        ans = min(ans, n - p + i)
    return ans
